EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_UK_Office_Opening_Q114.Reminder - non VIP
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder to RSVP! VIP Invite to the Launch of Pivotal UK
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline PIVOTAL UK LAUNCH PARTY As a global company, we thought it was time to open our doors to the great city of London. Located in the heart of Tech City <http://www.techcityuk.com/#!/home>, Pivotal UK is committed to the growth and development of Europe's fastest-growing innovation hub.
As a friend of Pivotal, the company at the intersection of big data <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data>, PaaS <http://www.gopivotal.com/paas>, and agile development <http://www.gopivotal.com/agile>, join us at McQueen in Shoreditch for an evening of fun drinks, and tasty bites to celebrate the opening of our newest office. Please RSVP below by February 28th to secure your spot.
REGISTER <http://play.gopivotal.com/EMEA_Event_UK_Office_Opening_Q114PivotalUK.html> McQUEEN <http://www.mcqueen-shoreditch.co.uk/> <http://www.mcqueen-shoreditch.co.uk/>55-61 TABERNACLE STREET, EC2A 4AA, WEDNESDAY, MARCH 5TH, 6:30PM - 9:30PM REGISTER <http://play.gopivotal.com/EMEA_Event_UK_Office_Opening_Q114PivotalUK.html>
